ctaDesc: Create your profile today and discover personalized opportunities that match your background, interests, and career goals.

education.title: Personalized Assessment
education.description: Discover your strengths, interests, and aptitudes through our tailored assessment tools designed specifically for rural backgrounds.

community.title: Local Opportunities
community.description: Connect with local employers, apprenticeships, and job roles that are accessible from your location and suit your skill set.

career.title: Government Schemes
career.description: Stay updated on relevant government schemes, scholarships, and initiatives that can support your career journey.

skills.title: Skill Development
skills.description: Access curated training programs, courses, and resources that match your profile and help you develop in-demand skills.

chatbot.title: Career Guidance Assistant
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm your career guidance assistant. How can I help you today?
chatbot.defaultResponse: I understand you're interested in career guidance. Could you tell me more about your background and interests?
suggestions: What career options are available in my field?
How can I improve my skills?
What are the best courses for my career?
